data.title: The On-Sale Calendar: December 2024
data.meta_description: A comprehensive list of the biggest adult books publishing in December.
data.text:
December 3

The Last One by Rachel Howzell Hall (Red Tower, $29.99; ISBN 9781649377098). 500,000 copies.

Tom Clancy Defense Protocol by Brian Andrews and Jeffrey Wilson (Putnam, $32.00; ISBN 9780593717974). 300,000 copies.

Stuart Woods’ Golden Hour by Brett Battles (Putnam, $30.00; ISBN 9780593331606). 150,000 copies.

Keep Me by Sara Cate (Sourcebooks Casablanca, $17.99 paper; ISBN 9781728282190). 150,000 copies.

A Wish for Us by Tillie Cole (Bloom, $12.99 paper; ISBN 9781464224324). 125,000 copies.

Main Street Millionaire by Codie Sanchez (Portfolio, $30.00; ISBN 9780593718612). 100,000 copies.

Falling Embers by Catherine Cowles (Sourcebooks Casablanca, $16.99 paper; ISBN 9781464224256). 100,000 copies.

Flamingo Estate: The Guide to Becoming Alive by Richard Christiansen (Chronicle, $50.00; ISBN 9781797229171). 75,000 copies.

Disaster Survival 101 by Creek Stewart (Adams, $18.99 paper; ISBN 9781507223079). 75,000 copies.

Sister Snake by Amanda Lee Koe (Ecco, $28.00; ISBN 9780063394759). 75,000 copies.

The Greatest Lie of All by Jillian Cantor (Park Row, $18.99 paper; ISBN 9780778310914). 75,000 copies.

Bellevue by Robin Cook (Putnam, $30.00; ISBN 9780593718834). 75,000 copies.

Rental House by Weike Wang (Riverhead, $28.00; ISBN 9780593545546). 75,000 copies.

Roland Rogers Isn’t Dead Yet by Samantha Allen (Zando, $18.00 paper; ISBN 9781638931539). 75,000 copies.

A Century of Tomorrows: How Imagining the Future Shapes the Present by Glenn Adamson (Bloomsbury, $32.99; ISBN 9781639730230). 65,000 copies.

I Might Be in Trouble by Daniel Aleman (Grand Central, $29.00; ISBN 9781538766347). 60,000 copies.

What It’s Like in Words by Eliza Moss (Holt, $28.99; ISBN 9781250355058). 60,000 copies.

The Power of Bridging by john a. powell (Sounds True, $20.99 paper; ISBN 9781649631657). 60,000 copies.

I Do: A Planner for Your Perfect Wedding Day by Shelly Hagen (Adams, $17.99 paper; ISBN 9781507222478). 50,000 copies.

The Voyage Home: A Novel by Pat Barker (Doubleday, $29.00; ISBN 9780385549110). 50,000 copies.

Ingrained by Callum Robinson (Ecco, $30.00; ISBN 9780063350830). 50,000 copies.

Unexpectedly Yours by C. Chilove (Forever, $17.99 paper9781538705643). 50,000 copies.

Apartment Women by Gu Byeong-mo, translated from Korean by Chi-young Kim (Hanover Square, $21.99; ISBN 9781335050076). 50,000 copies.

Why So Serious? by Mike Singer (Harper, $29.99; ISBN 9780063396807). 50,000 copies.

The Last Kilo by T. J. English (Morrow, $32.50; ISBN 9780063265530). 50,000 copies.

Against The Grain by Peter Lovesey (Soho Crime, $28.95; ISBN 9781641296151). 50,000 copies.

Love The Stranger by Michael Sears (Soho Crime, $27.95; ISBN 9781641295451). 50,000 copies.

The Internal Family Systems Workbook by Richard C. Schwartz (Sounds True, $22.99 paper; ISBN 9781649633118). 50,000 copies.

The Rivals by Jane Pek (Vintage, $18.00 paper; ISBN 9780593470152). 50,000 copies.

Designs on You by Jaci Burton (Berkley, $19.00 paper; ISBN 9780593439616).

PS: I Hate You by Lauren Connolly (Berkley, $19.00 paper; ISBN 9780593815663).

Under Loch and Key by Lana Ferguson (Berkley, $19.00 paper; ISBN 9780593816851).

Woo Woo by Ella Baxter (Catapult, $27.00; ISBN 9781646222568).

Locked In by Jussi Adler-Olsen, translated by Caroline Waight (Dutton, $30.00; ISBN 9780593475690).

Beyond the Call of Duty: The Life of Colonel Robert Howard, America's Most Decorated Green Beret by Stephen L. Moore (Dutton Caliber, $14.99 paper; ISBN 9780593475843).

The Troublemaker: How Jimmy Lai Became a Billionaire, Hong Kong's Greatest Dissident, and China's Most Feared Critic by Mark L. Clifford (Free Press, $28.99; ISBN 9781668027691).

The Close-Up by Pip Drysdale (Gallery, $28.99; ISBN 9781668037928).

Raised by a Serial Killer: Discovering the Truth About My Father by April Balascio (Gallery, $29.99; ISBN 9781982177034).

Digital Dharma: How AI Can Elevate Spiritual Intelligence and Personal Well-Being by Deepak Chopra (Harmony, $28.00; ISBN 9780593797525).

Pick-Up by Nora Dahlia (Gallery, $18.99 paper; ISBN 9781668061169).

The Secret of the Three Fates by Jess Armstrong (Minotaur, $28.00; ISBN 9781250909886).

Trouble Island by Sharon Short (Minotaur, $29.00; ISBN 9781250292841).

Abundant Ever After by Cathy Heller (Simon Element, $28.99; ISBN 9781668022382).

Cabin by Patrick Hutchison (St. Martin's, $29.00; ISBN 9781250285706).

The Cure for Women by Lydia Reeder (St. Martin's, $30.00; ISBN 9781250284457).

Seven Deadly Sins by Guy Leschziner (St. Martin's, $30.00; ISBN 9781250288813).

The Shutouts by Gabrielle Korn (St. Martin's, $29.00; ISBN 9781250323484).

December 10

A Monsoon Rising by Thea Guanzon (Harper Voyager, $32.00; ISBN 9780063277304). 150,000 copies.

Money for Couples: A Six-Week Program to Build Your Rich Life Together by Ramit Sethi (Workman, $19.99 paper; ISBN 9781523523689). 150,000 copies.

Corrupting the Innocent by P. Rayne (Avon, $17.99 paper; ISBN 9780063412453). 100,000 copies.

The French Winemaker's Daughter by Loretta Ellsworth (Harper Paperbacks, $18.99 paper; ISBN 9780063371811). 100,000 copies.

What the Wife Knew by Darby Kane (Morrow Paperbacks, $18.99 paper; ISBN 9780063351967). 100,000 copies.

Taylor Swift by the Book: The Literature Behind the Lyrics, from Fairy Tales to Tortured Poets by Rachel Feder and Tiffany Tatreau (Quirk, $19.99; ISBN 9781683694748). 100,000 copies.

Imposter Syndrome by Joseph Knox (Sourcebooks Landmark, $17.99 paper; ISBN 9781464219269). 100,000 copies.

Crush Your Money Goals by Bernadette Joy (Adams, $16.99 paper; ISBN 9781507222638). 75,000 copies.

When We Had Forever by Shaylin Gandhi (Canary Street, $18.99 paper; ISBN 9781335230874). 75,000 copies.

The Bible in 52 Weeks for Men by Josh Laxton (Callisto, $16.99 paper; ISBN 9798886504217). 50,000 copies.

I Made It Out of Clay by Beth Kander (MIRA, $30.00; ISBN 9780778368120). 50,000 copies.

The Champagne Letters by Kate MacIntosh (Gallery, $28.99; ISBN 9781668061886).

Drawing the Body by Roberto Osti (Monacelli Studio, $39.95; ISBN 9781580936453).

Catching Whimsy: 365 Days of Possibility by Bob Goff (Nelson, $22.99; ISBN 9781400226986).

December 17

The Killer’s Game (media tie-in) by Jay Bonansinga (Morrow Paperbacks, $19.99 paper; ISBN 9780063418752). 150,000 copies.

False Start by Elsie Silver (Bloom, $17.99 paper; ISBN 9781464220807). 100,000 copies.

Lawbreaker by Diana Palmer (Canary Street, $27.99; ISBN 9781335513113). 100,000 copies.

Sharpe's Storm by Bernard Cornwell (Harper, $32.00; ISBN 9780063219434). 75,000 copies.

Black Girls Breathing: Heal from Trauma, Combat Chronic Stress, and Find Your Freedom by Jasmine Marie (Balance, $30.00; ISBN 9781538756621). 50,000 copies.

The Gravity of Us by Brittainy Cherry (Sourcebooks Casablanca, $16.99 paper; ISBN 9781728297149). 50,000 copies.

December 24

A Sky of Emerald Stars by A.K. Mulford (Harper Voyager, $28.99; ISBN 9780063291478). 100,000 copies.

North Is The Night by Emily Rath (Erewhon, $30.00; ISBN 9781645662204). 100,000 copies.

One Last Rainy Day by Kate Stewart (Kensington, $18.95 paper; ISBN 9781496754646). 65,000 copies.

The Resurrectionist by A. Rae Dunlap (Kensington, $28.00; ISBN 9781496750341). 50,000 copies.

Watch Your Back by Terri Perlato (Kensington, $28.00; ISBN 9781496738622). 50,000 copies.

December 31

Where the Creek Bends by Linda Lael Miller (Canary Street, $21.99; ISBN 9781335006394). 125,000 copies.

Eddie Winston Is Looking for Love by Marianne Cronin (Harper Perennial, $18.99 paper; ISBN 9780063383517). 100,000 copies.

Break Up on Purpose by John Kim (HarperOne, $27.99; ISBN 9780063275331). 100,000 copies.

Self Help by Gabrielle Bernstein (Hay House, $25.99; ISBN 9781401976668). 100,000 copies.

Break My Rules by Roxy Sloane (Avon, $17.99 paper; ISBN 9780063418424). 75,000 copies.

The Wrong Heart by Jennifer Hartmann (Bloom, $17.99 paper; ISBN 9781464236389). 50,000 copies.

Definitely Better Now by Ava Robinson (MIRA, $30.00; ISBN 9780778310594). 50,000 copies.

Sisters in Science by Olivia Campbell (Park Row, $27.99; ISBN 9780778333388). 50,000 copies.

B2B Influencer Marketing: Using Creators to Boost Your Brand by Nick Bennett and Bryan Grover (Kogan Page, $41.99 paper; ISBN 9781398615281).

Business 101 for the Data Professional by Jordan Morrow (Kogan Page, $28.99 paper; ISBN 9781398617063).

Growth Marketing Strategy: Drive Profits and Sustained Business Growth by Rose Jia (Kogan Page, $39.99 paper; ISBN 9781398618343).

The Human Factor: How to Realize the Potential of your People and your Business by Michael Esau and Simon Humphreys (Kogan Page, $38.99 paper; ISBN 9781398618169).

Responsible Marketing: How to Create an Authentic and Inclusive Marketing Strategy by Lola Bakare (Kogan Page, $32.99 paper; ISBN 9781398611627).

Rethinking Operating Models: Designing Business Structures, Processes and Activities for Competitive Advantage by Amy Kates, Greg Kesler, and Kent McMillan (Kogan Page, $42.99 paper; ISBN 9781398617964).

Mickey7 (media tie-in) by Edward Ashton (St. Martin’s Griffin, $18.00 paper; ISBN 9781250385406).
